commit.message:
8261712: Lanai: Crash in MTLClip when Metal API Validation enabled

Do not use stencil in stencil mask generation
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:openjdk/lanai into openjdk_lanai_avu

8261638: Lanai: crash in Clipping tab of J2Demo

Pass stencilNeeded flag to pipelineStateStorage
